vlive.korean: [한치 앞도 보이지 않는 칠흑 같은 의문의 공간] 저도 그 느낌 알아요. [Mysterious space in pitch darkness] I know how it feels. 듣기 View video GOT7 : [REAL GOT7 Season 4] EP09. 갓세븐 스릴러 게임의 비밀은...?
vlive.english: [Mysterious space in pitch darkness] I know how it feels.

vlive.korean: [칠흑 같은 어둠] - 동그란 식탁이에요? - 동그란 것 같아. [Pitch black dining room] - Or a round table? - I think it's round. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : [FULL]더 보이즈 '꽃미남 분식집' 5회 The BOYZ "Flower Snack" ep.5
vlive.english: [Pitch black dining room] - Or a round table? - I think it's round.

examples.korean: the inky blackness of the cellar 발음듣기 칠흑같이 어두운 지하실 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the inky blackness of the cellar 발음

examples.korean: The streets were as black as ebony at night. 발음듣기 길거리는 밤에 칠흑 같았다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: After sundown, we were cloaked in complete darkness. 발음듣기 해가 지자 칠흑 같은 어둠이 밀려들었다 Neungyule
examples.english: After sundown, we were cloaked in complete darkness. 발음

examples.korean: The overcast sky it was black as the Ace of Spade. 발음듣기 먹구름이 낀 하늘은 칠흑같이 어두웠다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The overcast sky it was black as the Ace of Spade. 발음

examples.korean: With the setting of the sun, pitch darkness fell. 발음듣기 해가 지자 칠흑 같은 어둠이 밀려들었다 Neungyule
